API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API Hash from https://my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot Token from @BotFather on Telegram

SESSION.description: Your User Session String from @SessionStringZBot (trusted generator)

CHAT_IDS.description: Comma-separated list of chat IDs to monitor (negative numbers for groups/channels). Example: [-1001234567890,-1009876543210]

DELETE_TIMERS.description: Optional: Custom delete timers for each chat. Format: chat_id:seconds,chat_id:seconds. Example: -1001234567890:3600,-1009876543210:7200

CLEANUP_INTERVAL_MINUTES.description: Interval in minutes between scheduled cleanups

MAX_MESSAGE_HISTORY_HOURS.description: Maximum hours of message history to process during cleanup

HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL.description: Heartbeat interval in seconds for health monitoring
